caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 5.
Diestramima beybienkoi Qin, Wang, Liu & Li, 2016
, A–F. male, G–H. female: A–C. head and pronotum: A. frontal view, B. lateral view, C. dorsal view; D–E. apex of abdomen: D. lateral view, E. dorsal view; F. hind basitarsus in lateral view; G. subgenital plate in ventral view; H. ovipositor in lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. China ( Chongqing , Guangxi , Guizhou , Hubei , Hunan , Sichuan , Yunnan ).
